anathema: Force others to follow your path, inflict void damage, age others or steal life with magic
edict: Empower local communities, learn from elders, share and teach from experiences
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Shei (The Ibis Matron)](/Deities.aspx?ID=653)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 12

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) This deity grants [_illusory scene_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1570) instead of dreaming potential_

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Empower local communities, learn from elders, share and teach from experiences

**Anathema** Force others to follow your path, inflict void damage, age others or steal life with magic

**Area of Concern**
Age, life, self-actualization

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)

**Favored Weapon** [Sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=364)

**Domains** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=74), [Freedom](/Domains.aspx?ID=77), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=78), [Perfection](/Domains.aspx?ID=89)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Introspection](/Domains.aspx?ID=110)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Liberating Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=2354)

- **3rd**
[Hypercognition](/Spells.aspx?ID=1563)

- **5th**
[Dreaming Potential](/Spells.aspx?ID=1504)

</column>
name: Shei (The Ibis Matron)
